features: 1. Touch Control Bedside Lamp - This smooth dimmable touch control table lamp featured with touch-sensitive sensor, to make quick changes to 3 different level brightness (Low, Medium, High), and soften the atmosphere quickly for you. Simply a touch or a pat on the bedside lamps' base or lamps' supporting pole when you want the nightstand lamp On/Off, brighter/dimmer. (used as a night lamp at low brightness, medium/high is enough to meet your needs for reading/working)

2. USB & USB-C Charging Ports and Outlet - Power 3 devices at once bedside lamp! With a usb-c port (5V/2.1A) and a usb-a port (5V/2.1A) and a outlet (120v) on the small nightstand lamp for fast charging, getting your phones, pad, laptops, humidifier, kindle, headsets, speaker, earbuds and other electronics fully charged all from a single small table lamp no matter if the bed side table lamp is on or off. Your best bedroom desk lighting lamp!

3. Plug and Play Table Lamp - Package included a non-flicker FREE E26 led light bulb (worth $9), a install-free flaxen fabric shade, a stable lamp body and a touch control metal base with wooden finishing. Put all together for a minimalism lamp is really perfect to decorate anywhere of your house. An ideal USB nightstand lamp for bedroom, guest room, living room, study room, kids room for girls and boys, office room, desk, etc. at the same time.

4. LED Light Bulb Included - For saving you more time on finding a correct bulb, we particularly pair with an non-flicker E26 LED light bulb. Unlike other dazzling side table light lamp, our bedside lamp with dual usb port and outlet provides no-flickering lights, to protect you and your kids and family's eyes from eye strain, or eyesight damages. You'll love how easy it is to get to your device when you need it. Gone are the days of running to the nearest power outlet.

𝐅𝐞𝐧𝐦𝐳𝐞𝐞 - Our team was founded by three interior designers who had been struggling for years to find practical, aesthetic and well made lighting and room decoration for their homes. They teamed up with a top lighting manufacturer and this year launched a great table lamp at a great price and is now available to everyone!! Fenmzee team design all our products in house, using only the selected materials to ensure they not only look good in your home, but will last for years to come.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3-Way Touch Control Lamp Use 15% brightness as a bedroom night light for a restful sleep.Switch to 60% brightness for a comfortable study desk lamp.Use 100% brightness as a living room table lamp for family gatherings.

Simply Reach Out! Use the USB-A port with most standard USB cables for charging.Use the USB-C port with the type C cable for charging.Use the 2-pin AC outlet with standard US chargers. Charge your electronic devices easily with our versatile charging ports!

Make it Simple and Practical Our package makes everything easy and convenient for you from the moment you open it. Installation takes less than a minute, and the lamp's simple touch controls, USB and outlet charging functions are designed to provide you with a better and more practical experience. The package includes a flicker-free LED bulb with three brightness levels (3000K), ensuring that you can create the perfect ambiance in your space.The touch-sensitive wood-printed lamp base and metal lamp pole provide the convenience of being able to turn the lamp on and off at any time during the night.The lampshade fixing ring ensures that your lamp stays stable and securely in place.An easy-to-understand user manual is included, which will help you quickly resolve any issues you may encounter.

The minimalist design fits perfectly in any room, and the USB port, USB-C port, and outlet provide hassle-free charging options for all my gadgets. Truly the best bedroom desk lighting solution! I love this Touch Control Bedside Lamp! It's so convenient to adjust the brightness with just a touch. Perfect for setting a cozy ambiance or providing enough light for reading or working. Plus, the USB and USB-C ports are a game-changer, allowing me to charge multiple devices simultaneously. A practical touch lamp for my bedroom! I'm so happy with this Lamp for my daughter's room! The touch control feature is perfect for her, as she can easily adjust the brightness with a simple touch. The included LED bulb provides a soft and gentle light, ensuring her eyes are protected. The USB port is a bo nus, allowing her to charge her tablet conveniently. It's a beautiful and practical addition to her room! I can't recommend this touch table lamp enough! The included led light bulb is dimmable, ensuring a comfortable lighting experience. Having the dual usb ports and outlet right on the lamp is a game-changer. No more searching for power outlets. It's a perfect addition to my bedroom!

I'm absolutely thrilled with it! The lamp has a modern and sleek design that looks great in my bedroom, and the usb charging port is incredibly convenient for charging my phone and other devices overnight. Wood base lamp for my study room I bought this table lamp for my study room and I couldn't be happier with it! The lamp has a beautiful wood base that complements my desk perfectly, giving the room a warm and inviting feel. Touch Bedroom Lamp (Table Lamp) The touch lamp is amazing! It's so convenient to use with its touch-sensitive switch, and the three different brightness levels make it perfect for any time of day. Plus, the usb ports and ac outlet are a game-changer. Highly recommend! In Love With This Desk Lamp I'm in love with this desk lamp for my studio. The 3 brightness levels are perfect. Its sleek design and touch control are so convenient. The LED bulbs provide great lighting, and it's built to last. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE this lamp!
reviews.reviewText: When I ordered this lamp, I have to admit that I was skeptical because of the price. But now that I have it, I absolutely love it! It is the perfect size, and the three brightness settings are perfect. Its nice sleek design gives me extra room on my nightstand, and the Standard USB and USB-C ports, along with an extra outlet are added bonuses! They all worked perfectly. Although the base is small, it is solid and relatively heavy, which prevents the lamp from sliding around on the nightstand. I bought one for my son as well, and he loves it too. I may buy another one for my theater room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son’s room and he likes it. The lamp is small but gets bright and lights up the room. The lampshade allows maximum light without hurting our eyes to look at it. The touch on/off is a great feature also. I switched out the bulb with the one we already had that works with remote. The base is stable and the wood grain is pretty. Everything I was looking for is in this lamp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First, this lamp is the perfect size for a bedside table. It is compact and the cylindrical shade takes up no extra room. The low level light isn't intrusive. Medium gives good light, and high is great for reading. The best feature is being to able to switch the lamp on and off just by touching the wooden base or the metal. So convenient. Also, there are charging stations in the base. Inexpensive and easy to assemble too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice desk lamp for work
reviews.reviewText: Nice lamp for work. Only issue is the light flickers from time to time. Not a huge issue, just more of an annoyance. Plenty of plugs for charging items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: iT'S A Simple, nice looking lamp. Easy use touch with 3 different light modes. Doesn't take up much space with the cylinder style lamp shade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect side table lamp
reviews.reviewText: I’m at home recovering from surgery and wanted a bedside lamp that wasn’t cumbersome to turn on. This little light is perfect, touch works great, good light, multiple plugs for charging, and came with everything you need. What a deal and matches the design of the room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very wonderful purchase ...great entire experience
reviews.reviewText: This lamp doesn't cost a ton but has a myriad of great features. It comes wrapped so well that throwing it off a truck was unlikely to break it. Extremely easy to set up. After clearing my dresser space, which took the longest part of the whole experience, and plugged it in I am amazed at the three light levels. The lowest I leave on in the evening, just enough to navigate around all the Christmas boxes, the next to change clothes, and the brightest to read with. I also like the energy efficiency of the lamp, the lack of heat from the enclosed bulb and the USB charger on the base! Overall one of my best purchases from Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little lamp!
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice lamp. It works as advertised. I particularly like that it’s activated by touching any part of the base. My last lamp was activated by touch but you had to tap a certain spot on the lamp that I could never find in the middle of the night. One other thing I like about this lamp is the three light levels. The brightest level is very brute but it’s a soft color through the shade so it’s easy on the eyes. Overall great lamp!

All good, it works well. The only consideration is that it's smaller than the images lead me to believe. It's convenient as a bedside lamp. It uses touch to turn on and has 3 brightness levels that cycle at every touch. You need to go through all three settings to turn it off. It also comes with a bulb that has a pleasant warm hue.
Super easy to assemble, awesome that they come with lightbulbs, sensitive to touch, usb port works great, lovely mottled cream look for shade and wood look for base. Super stoked with our purchase.
A little smaller than we envisioned but all good!
